Package TransactionPkg

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
TransactionPkg.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the database for all types of accounts that the user inputs in the program. Handles print, remove, add, and automatically grows the database when limit is reached.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AccountDatabase()
    Default constructor for AccountDatabase class Initializes variables to starting values as described below to create an Accounts Database

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean add​(Account account)
    Adds an account to the database
    boolean deposit​(Account account, double amount)
    Deposits an amount into an account, return value is dependent on it's success
    void printAccounts()
    Prints the accounts in the database
    void printByDateOpen()
    Prints the Statements based on the sorting of dates, including interest and fees
    void printByLastName()
    Prints the Statements based on the sorting of last names, including interest and fees
    boolean remove​(Account account)
    Remove an account from the Accounts array
    int withdrawal​(Account account, double amount)
    Withdrawals a passed amount from a passed account, returns an int dependent on it's success

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountDatabase

      public AccountDatabase()
      Default constructor for AccountDatabase class Initializes variables to starting values as described below to create an Accounts Database

  • Method Details

    • add

      public boolean add​(Account account)
      Adds an account to the database
      Parameters:
      account - Account to be added to the database
      Returns:
      - returns a boolean that shows whether or not an account already exists, if it doesn't an account is added.

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Account account)
      Remove an account from the Accounts array
      Parameters:
      account - Target account to remove
      Returns:
      boolean, returns true or false if remove is successful

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit​(Account account, double amount)
      Deposits an amount into an account, return value is dependent on it's success
      Parameters:
      account - Target account to deposit money into
      amount - Target amount to add to the balance
      Returns:
      Boolean - returns true or false if the deposit is successful

    • withdrawal

      public int withdrawal​(Account account, double amount)
      Withdrawals a passed amount from a passed account, returns an int dependent on it's success
      Parameters:
      account - Target account to remove money from
      amount - Target amount to be removed
      Returns:
      Int - 0 if successful, 1 if insufficient funds, -1 if the account doesn't exist

    • printByDateOpen

      public void printByDateOpen()
      Prints the Statements based on the sorting of dates, including interest and fees

    • printByLastName

      public void printByLastName()
      Prints the Statements based on the sorting of last names, including interest and fees

    • printAccounts

      public void printAccounts()
      Prints the accounts in the database
